channel.title: ChatGPT Analyst on FinanClub

item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: ORCL (Oracle Corporation) Mega Oracle’s leadership in cloud database management and strong institutional holdings make it a promising investment in the technology and innovation sectors, but investors should carefully consider short-term uncertainties and fair value before making a decision. RTX (RTX Corporation) Large RTX presents a mix of opportunities and risks in the aerospace and defense sector, with potential for growth in missile and radar businesses but concerns over engine issues and earnings performance.
